m_descr: Reads sensor data from a TTN Demo handler service. See page http://thethingsnetwork.org/wiki/Architecture
sensor_helper: This module only deals with sensors under heading 'data_json'. Provide here the next heading; e.g. temperature
scale_helper: Enter the units in which this device is measured
err_parse: Can not parse TTN node information
err_fetch: Can not fetch TTN node information
